resources.string:
MineBuilder Handbook
	Version 2.0
	© Anthony Boot 2011

Minebuilder and graphics
	© Bram Buurlage + Alex Graphmaster 2011

All graphics are used with permission.

All available items in game are displayed here, even if they are not craftable.
This is so users with modifications to the game can easily find the ID of an item they want to use in a recipe or otherwise modify.

--Bugs/suggestions?--
Drop a message for Xenoxis on the Minebuilder Forums.
http://minebuilder.org/

If you want to share this app with your friends, help me out and use this link:
http://adf.ly/3Dxgr

Thanks :)
No handler found for this item\nThis is a bug and you should report it.
Select item to craft from list.
There isn\'t a display mode set for your phone. Contact XenoXis on the Minebuilder Forums.
